lead: Camden offers comprehensive college consulting services for students pursuing top universities and conservatories.
intro: Having successfully navigated the admissions process at multiple Ivy League institutions and elite dual degree programs, Camden provides personalized guidance to help students achieve their academic and musical aspirations.

features.title: University Admissions
features.description: Strategic guidance for applications to top universities, including Ivy League schools, with expertise in essays, interviews, and positioning

features.title: Dual Degree Programs
features.description: Specialized consulting for competitive dual degree music programs that combine conservatory training with liberal arts education

features.title: Conservatory Applications
features.description: Comprehensive support for music school applications, including repertoire selection, pre-screening recordings, and audition preparation

features.title: Application Strategy
features.description: Personalized roadmap for building a compelling application, from school selection to timeline management

expertise: Camden was admitted to numerous Ivy League universities and holds a B.A. from **Harvard University**. He has successfully gained admission to most of the nation's top dual degree music programs, combining elite academic institutions with premier conservatories. He currently studies at **The Juilliard School**, giving him firsthand experience with both traditional university and conservatory pathways.
